title: No independent judicial review in China

content.question: Which of the following is an accurate feature of the judiciary in China?

choices.label: There are no judges, only juries.
There is no independent judicial review
Judges are accountable to the public that elects them.
The Supreme Court has the power to overturn an act of the National Peopleâ€™s Congress.
Judges have found the death penalty unconstitutional.

content.answer: There is no independent judicial review

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
